properties.short description: Rainulf II and Robert II Approach Lothar for Aid Against Roger II
properties.description: Rainulf II and Robert II travel to Rome and attempt to garner Lothar's aid, but fail to do so.
properties.people:
Lothar, King of the Germans
Rainulf II, Count of Caiazzo and Alife
Robert II, Prince of the Capuans
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.short description: Abbot Alexander of Telese Sends Request for Silver
properties.description: The prior Stephen was sent to Roger II while he was in Salerno to request silver for the altar pieces taken by Rainulf II.  The silver was given, and the prior returned.
properties.people:
Roger II, King
Alexander, Abbot of Telese
Stephen, prior
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).
